mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY ( DIARY_USER, DIARY_NO, DIARY_TITLE, DIRAY_CONTENT, DIARY_YN, ATT_YN, DIARY_DATE, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{diaryUser}, SEQ_DIARY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{diaryTitle}, #{diaryContent}, 'Y', #{attStatus}, #{diaryDate}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATT_NO, CONTENT_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, MODIFIED_NAME, ATT_CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATT_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_DIARY_NO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{modifiedName}, #{attCategoryNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT DIARY_NO diaryNo, NVL(DC.DIARY_NAME,'YOUR MY DIARY') diaryName, NVL(ATT.MODIFIED_NAME, '') modifiedName, DIARY_TITLE diaryTitle, DIRAY_CONTENT diaryContent, ATT_YN attStatus, DIARY_DATE diaryDate FROM DIARY D FULL JOIN DIARY_NAME_CATEGORY DC ON (USER_NO = DIARY_USER) FULL JOIN ATTACHMENT ATT ON (D.DIARY_NO = ATT.CONTENT_NO) WHERE D.DIARY_USER = #{userNo} OR DC.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY_NAME_CATEGORY ( USER_NO, DIARY_NAME ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{diaryName} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DIARY_NAME_CATEGORY WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT DIARY_NO diaryNo, DIARY_TITLE diaryTitle, MODIFIED_NAME modifiedName, DIRAY_CONTENT diaryContent, ATT_YN attStatus, DIARY_DATE diaryDate FROM DIARY D FULL JOIN ATTACHMENT ATT ON (D.DIARY_NO = ATT.CONTENT_NO) WHERE DIARY_USER = #{diaryUser} AND DIARY_TITLE = #{diaryTitle} AND DIARY_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( SCHEDULE_NO, USER_NO, SC_DATE, SC_TIME, SC_TITLE, SC_CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCHEDULE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{scDate}, #{scTime}, #{scTitle}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_NO scheduleNo, SC_TITLE scTitle, SC_DATE scDate, SC_TIME scTime, SC_TITLE scTitle FROM SCHEDULE WHERE USER_NO = #{diaryUser}
mapper.update: UPDATE DIARY SET DIARY_YN = 'N' WHERE DIARY_USER = #{diaryUser} AND DIARY_NO = #{diaryNo}
